qa_pair.question: What is the username of the author who posted the very first item on Hacker News (item ID 1)?
Look up item 8863 on Hacker News. What is the title of this story and who submitted it? Provide the answer in the format "Title by username".
qa_pair.answer: My YC app: Dropbox - Throw away your USB drive by dhouston

qa_pair.question: Find the comment with ID 2921983 on Hacker News. Who wrote this comment, and what is the ID of its parent item?
Look up the Hacker News user "pg". What does their "about" field say?
What is the URL linked in the very first Hacker News story (item ID 1)?
How many direct top-level comments (kids) does the Ask HN post with ID 121003 have? Also, what is the title of this post?
qa_pair.answer: 3 comments, titled "Ask HN: The Arc Effect"

qa_pair.question: Search Hacker News for stories about "Dropbox" and find the earliest result. Who is the author of that earliest story?
Look up item 8863 and then retrieve its first comment (the first ID in the kids array). Who authored that first comment?
What type of item is HN item 192327, and who posted it?
Look at the Hacker News user "dang". According to their profile, what email address do they suggest for sending HN questions?
